law.catch_line: In Annapolis, the Mayor and Aldermen of the City of Annapolis may constitute the Board of License Co...
law.text: In Annapolis, the Mayor and Aldermen of the City of Annapolis may constitute the Board of License Commissioners for the City or may delegate all or any portion of the authority to regulate alcoholic beverage licensees to a subsidiary board established by the Mayor and Aldermen. The Board of License Commissioners of Anne Arundel County shall have no jurisdiction in the City of Annapolis.
